price: 3. Waarlijk in de hemelen en de aarde zijn tekenen voor de gelovigen.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: inna fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin lil'mu'minīna
